name: Sakuya's Endless Nightmare
description:
Control:

KeyBoard:

Left & Right Arrow: MoveAround  Space: Jump  D: Attck  S: Use machine

XboxController:

Left Joystick: MoveAround  A: Jump  X: Attack  Y: Use machine

GameStory:

Trapped in a dream, Sakuya collects fuel, manipulates a console, and turns on a time machine to travel between the past and present. Defeat or dodge incoming enemies and score higher in this endless nightmare!
